section.p: The following tables show the correspondence between the old Control Panel/Bar and the new Persona Bar.

stentry.p: Site TimeZone only. The rest were deprecated.
HTML Page Header Tags only. The rest were deprecated.

ol.li: Open or View Support Tickets tab
From the Show dropdown, choose Superusers.
From the ellipses menu for the target account, choose Login As User.

strow.stentry: Edit Bar and on the page
Edit Bar and on the page

ol.li: Add Page or Add Multiple Pages
Click/Tap the gear icon, and go to the Permissions tab.
Add Page or Add Multiple Pages
In Template Mode, select Import from XML.

image.alt: Old Control Panel/Bar menu - Edit Page

strow.stentry: Edit (pencil) icon at the bottom of the Persona Bar
